item.description: Hello. I sent out an email a little over a week ago wondering if there were any 9 -10 minute milers out there who don't run at the crack of dawn. I received several replies so I thought I'd organize something official. This is my first week of training for the Marine Corps Marathon and I'm planning to do a 7.5 mile run along the Charles tomorrow beginning at Panera Bread in Watertown (395 Arsenal Street, Arsenal on the Charles). I picked this location because there's lots of available parking. I am going to run at 9:00 AM. If you'd like to join me (misery loves company), you'll be able to spot me in front of Panera pretty easily. I'll be the neurotic brunette with the "Oh God, no one is going to show up" look on my face. Please let me know if you'd like to attend.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Saturday 7.5 Mile Run Along the Charles
